title: Eligibility Verification UI
description:
Build Healthcare Eligibility Verification System

Create a comprehensive eligibility verification interface that enables healthcare providers to submit real-time verification requests and view patient coverage information.

Core Functionality:

1. Eligibility Verification Form
   - Required fields: Patient first/last name, date of birth (MM/DD/YYYY), member/subscriber ID, insurance provider/payer selection
   - Optional fields: Service type code, rendering provider NPI, date of service
   - Input validation: Format checking (DOB format, ID alphanumeric patterns), required field enforcement, real-time inline error messages
   - Support for both subscriber and dependent verification
   - Clear distinction between subscriber information and patient information when different

2. Request Submission & State Management
   - POST eligibility verification request to backend API endpoint
   - Display loading spinner with "Verifying coverage..." message during API call
   - Handle success: Store response with unique request ID and timestamp
   - Handle errors: Network failures, timeout scenarios, invalid member ID, payer system unavailable
   - Implement retry mechanism for transient failures
   - Prevent duplicate submissions (disable button during processing)

3. Coverage Information Display
   - Status indicator: Active (green), Inactive (red), Pending (yellow) with clear visual differentiation
   - Coverage period: Effective date, termination date (if applicable), plan year dates
   - Financial responsibility breakdown:
     * Individual/family deductible (met amount / total amount)
     * Out-of-pocket maximum (met amount / total amount)
     * Copay amounts by service type
     * Coinsurance percentages
   - Benefit categories: Medical, dental, vision, pharmacy, mental health
   - Network status: In-network vs out-of-network benefit differences
   - Plan details: Plan name, group number, payer contact information

4. Edge Case Handling
   - No active coverage: Display clear message with last known coverage dates
   - Partial data: Show available information, indicate missing fields
   - Multiple active plans: Display all plans with coordination of benefits information
   - Future-dated coverage: Show pending effective date prominently
   - Terminated coverage: Display termination date and reason if available
   - Real-time eligibility unavailable: Offer batch verification option

5. User Experience Enhancements
   - Export functionality: Download as PDF, export to CSV, copy to clipboard
   - Print view: Clean, formatted printout without navigation elements
   - Verification history: Searchable table of past verifications with date, patient name, status
   - Insurance terminology tooltips: Hover explanations for deductible, coinsurance, out-of-pocket maximum, etc.
   - Auto-save form data to prevent re-entry on errors
   - Recent searches: Quick access to previously verified member IDs

Technical Considerations:
- Ensure HIPAA compliance for all patient data handling
- Implement proper authentication/authorization before accessing verification features
- Add audit logging for all verification requests
- Cache verification results appropriately (typically 24-hour validity)
- Support keyboard navigation and screen reader accessibility
- Responsive design for tablet/mobile access
- Handle timezone differences for date/timestamp display

Success Criteria:
- Form submission completes within 3 seconds under normal conditions
- Coverage information displays in scannable, hierarchical format
- All required fields validated before submission
- Error states provide actionable guidance to users
- Exported/printed results contain all relevant coverage details
